titleStmt.title: Homer's Iliads in English by Tho. Hobbes ; to which may be added Homers Odysses, Englished by the same author.
Iliad. English
titleStmt.author: Homer.
Hobbes, Thomas, 1588-1679.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
The edition of the Odyssey mentioned in the title was published in 1675.
